passage.title: I get up early this morning
passage.paragraph: Bob doesn't get to sleep at night. He goes to see his doctor. The doctor gives him some sleeping pills.
Sunday night Bob takes the pills, and sleeps very well. He is awake before he hears the alarm clock. He gets up and goes to the office. He says to his boss, "I get up early this morning."
"That's fine," shouts the boss, "but where are you Monday and Tuesday?"
